title: Episode 50 - China - Chinese Civil War 1923-1937
itunes:author: The History of the Cold War Podcast
itunes:summary: In this episode we examine the start of the Chinese Civil War between the Nationalists and The Chinese Communist Party.  We also examine the rise of the two faction leaders Mao Zedong and Chiang Kai-shek.  We review the exile of the Chinese Communists to the wilderness of Yan'an and the Nanjing Decade of Nationalist control of China.

description: In this episode we examine the start of the Chinese Civil War between the Nationalists and The Chinese Communist Party.  We also examine the rise of the two faction leaders Mao Zedong and Chiang Kai-shek.  We review the exile of the Chinese Communists to the wilderness of Yan'an and the Nanjing Decade of Nationalist control of China.
